articles.title: Highlights: St Johnstone 0-3 Rangers
articles.description: Rangers ease past St Johnstone in Perth to make it 11 successive Scottish Premiership victories and maintain their 16-point lead at the top.
articles.content: Rangers ease past St Johnstone in Perth to make it 11 successive Scottish Premiership victories and maintain their 16-point lead at the top.

articles.title: Highlights: Hibernian 1-0 St Mirren
articles.description: A lovely strike from Kevin Nisbet is enough to lift Hibernian into third place in the Premiership for Christmas as St Mirren's good run comes to an end.
